Text:
It's not Allah. it's the stupid people that interpret and manipulate ppl so thay have power over them.

Tis is tru allso for Christianity !

Yes we should get rid of all that bronze age bullshit
leave behind all our discarded gods
Fantasies are fun. Worship some today. Do I believe in gods? Shit yeah! I carve a few every morning!

Y'know, I was gonna stay out of this nonsense until I saw someone named "judenRAUS" call people racist scumbags, how adorable. Do you seriously believe any of these nitwits have any clue what Zionism is? I consider myself a post-Zionist, does that mean I get to be an anti-Semitic mouth breather every time some random person insults Islam? Grow a pair and a brain, you're not helping anyone.

Anyhow, this torrent is notable for being the first time I've ever seen (from the rock I live under) an Arabic script attempted in ASCII, kinda neat.
